dimension: 40 1/2 x 12 1/4 in. (102.87 x 31.12 cm) (without yarn tassels)
life_date: North America, Great Lakes or Woodlands region
text: This bandolier bag features abstracted representations of leaves, flowers and berries, which are essential elements of traditional Anishinabe lifestyle. One strap has a series of small hourglass-shaped figures, symbolizing Thunderbirds. Thunderbirds are a manito, or spiritual force, representing the power of the sky.
title: Bandolier Bag
